long_description: The windproof, warm, light and compressible Patagonia Nano Puff vest creates an ideal insulation layer under a shell and doubles as a stand-alone wind barrier in warmer conditions. PrimaLoft One(R) insulation provides excellent warmth and compressibility and will continue to insulate even in damp conditions. Recycled ripstop polyester glides effortlessly when worn as a mid or outer layer; Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Classic brick quilting pattern through the torso and waist with narrow horizontal quilting at side panels adds shape; burly thread adds durability. Soft, wicking interior stormflap; zipper garage; drawcord droptail hem; 2 zippered handwarmer pockets. The Patagonia Nano Puff vest has an internal chest pocket, with a clip-in loop, that doubles as a stuff sack.
short_description: The windproof, warm, light and compressible Patagonia Nano Puff vest creates an ideal insulation layer under a shell and doubles as a stand-alone wind barrier in warmer conditions.
